result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing various utility functions and helpers for encryption, file handling, token generation, and data manipulation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related functionalities into separate files for better maintainability and reusability.

pkg/helper/aes.go.purpose: This file provides functions for AES encryption of messages using a hashed key.

pkg/helper/binder.go.purpose: Provides custom binding functions for handling multipart file uploads in Echo framework.

pkg/helper/hmac_token.go.purpose: Generates an HMAC access token for API authentication.

pkg/helper/pointer.go.purpose: Provides a generic function to create a pointer to a value of any type.

pkg/helper/random.go.purpose: Generates a random string of specified length using alphanumeric characters.

pkg/helper/ronin.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for normalizing Ethereum addresses and validating signatures.

pkg/helper/slice.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for filtering, indexing, mapping, and converting slices.

pkg/helper/tls.go.purpose: This file provides a function to convert certificate and key data into a TLS configuration.
